name: Barrels Up
description: Youâ€™ve spent the night cavorting at the Pistolrock saloon only to come out and see that Jeopardy James has sent his army of barrel goons onto you. Defend yourself and use what you can find around you to fight through the waves of barrels as fast as you can.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: VR Headset Required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-6700 Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: VR Headset Required
